channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 Polestar 将在全球裁员约 450 人
item.description: Electric car maker Polestar Automotive Holding , plans to cut around 450 jobs globally, or about 15% of its workforce, amid "challenging market conditions", the Swedish company said on Friday.翻译:瑞典电动汽车制造商 Polestar Automotive Holding 周五表示，由于“市场条件充满挑战”，该公司计划在全球范围内裁员约 450 人，占员工总数的 15% 左右。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国恒大集团对母公司提起法律诉讼
item.description: Evergrande Property Services said on Friday its units have started legal proceedings against parent China Evergrande to recover 11.4 billion yuan ($1.59 billion) of pledge guarantees on deposit certificates.翻译:恒大物业服务周五表示，其子公司已对母公司中国恒大提起法律诉讼，要求追回114亿元人民币（合15.9亿美元）的存款单质押担保。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 加沙战争期间，以色列阿什杜德港面临来自中国的战略风险
item.description: Israel's government-run port of Ashdod has complained that a rival Chinese-run terminal at the northern port of Haifa has become a strategic risk during the Gaza war.翻译:以色列政府运营的阿什杜德港抱怨称，位于北部海法港的中国运营的竞争对手码头已成为加沙战争期间的战略风险。
item.author: Ari Rabinovitch, Jonathan Saul

item.title: 泽连斯基的高级顾问乌克兰邀请中国习近平参加“和平峰会”
item.description: Ukraine has invited Chinese President Xi Jinping to participate in a planned "peace summit" of world leaders in Switzerland, a top diplomatic adviser to President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said, as Russia's invasion approaches its second anniversary.翻译:乌克兰总统泽连斯基的高级外交顾问表示，在俄罗斯入侵两周年之际，乌克兰已邀请中国国家主席习近平参加计划在瑞士举行的世界领导人“和平峰会”。
item.author: Olena Harmash

item.title: 台湾报道中国在中美会谈前进行“战斗巡逻”
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said it detected 23 Chinese air force planes operating around Taiwan and carrying out "joint combat readiness patrols" with Chinese warships on Friday, ahead of high-level China-U.S. talks in Thailand.翻译:台湾国防部表示，周五在泰国举行中美高层会谈之前，发现有 23 架中国空军飞机在台湾周围活动，并与中国军舰进行“联合战备巡逻”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早间竞价：美国经济令人印象深刻，我们这个时代的个人消费支出
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 巴克莱将欧洲奢侈品行业评级上调至“增持”，因看好中国反弹
item.description: China's supportive policies and improving economic data in Europe will boost European luxury companies, Barclays said on Friday, raising its rating on the sector to "overweight".翻译:巴克莱周五表示，中国的支持性政策和欧洲经济数据的改善将提振欧洲奢侈品公司，并将其对该行业的评级上调至“增持”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 无论判决如何，南非的种族灭绝案都是一次外交胜利
item.description: South Africa's genocide case against Israel may have ruffled feathers in the capitals of vital Western trading partners, but it has boosted the country's standing as a champion of the downtrodden Global South.翻译:南非针对以色列的种族灭绝案可能激怒了重要西方贸易伙伴的首都，但它提升了该国作为受压迫的全球南方国家捍卫者的地位。
item.author: Tim Cocks

item.title: 中国股票基金周度资金流入创2015年以来最高纪录——美国银行
item.description: Investors poured almost $12 billion into Chinese equity funds in the week to Wednesday in the largest inflow since 2015 and the second largest ever, a BofA Global Research report showed on Friday - a positive sign for battered Chinese stocks.翻译:美银美林周五发布的全球研究报告显示，截至周三的一周内，投资者向中国股票基金注入了近 120 亿美元，这是自 2015 年以来最大的资金流入，也是有史以来的第二大资金流入，这对遭受重创的中国股市来说是一个积极的信号。
item.author: Alun John

item.title: 周六澳大利亚网球公开赛的比赛顺序
item.description: Order of play on the main court on the 14th day of the Australian Open on Saturday (times local, prefix number denotes seeding):翻译:周六澳网第14天主场比赛顺序（当地时间，前缀数字表示种子）：
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 持有美股的中国基金暂停交易以平息投资者狂热
item.description: A Shanghai-listed fund that holds U.S. stocks took the unusual step of suspending trading on Friday, saying it was necessary to protect investors after prices hit record levels in a scramble for overseas assets.翻译:一家持有美国股票的上海上市基金周五采取了不同寻常的暂停交易举措，称在争夺海外资产的过程中股价创下历史新高后，有必要保护投资者。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国开启农历新年旅游热潮 预计旅游人数将达90亿人次
item.description: China on Friday kicked off its busiest annual period of mass migration with a record 9 billion domestic trips expected to be made during a 40-day travel rush around the Lunar New Year holidays, state media predicted.翻译:官方媒体预测，中国周五拉开了年度最繁忙的大规模人口流动时期的序幕，预计农历新年假期前后 40 天的旅游高峰期间，国内旅游人数将达到创纪录的 90 亿人次。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 人头马股价因美国和中国经济改善迹象而飙升
item.description: Remy Cointreau's shares had their best day in over two decades on Friday, surging as much as 17% after the French spirits maker's commentary on China and the United States helped to lift some of the investor gloom over these two key markets.翻译:周五，法国烈酒制造商人头马君度 (Remy Cointreau) 的股价上涨了 17%，创下了二十多年来最好的一天，此前这家法国烈酒制造商对中国和美国的评论帮助缓解了投资者对这两个关键市场的一些忧郁情绪。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 恒大可能的清算以及接下来会发生什么
item.description: A key offshore bondholder group of China Evergrande plans to join a petition to liquidate the developer at a hearing in a Hong Kong court on Monday, Reuters reported this week.翻译:据路透社本周报道，中国恒大的一个主要离岸债券持有人集团计划在周一香港法院的听证会上加入清算该开发商的请愿书。
item.author: Clare Jim, Scott Murdoch

item.title: 中国各省份在未能实现之前的目标后，制定了 2024 年温和增长的目标
item.description: Many provinces in China including the financial hub of Shanghai have set modest 2024 economic growth targets after missing their previous goals, in a sign that a nationwide recovery to pre-pandemic levels would yet again prove elusive this year.翻译:包括金融中心上海在内的中国许多省份在未能实现之前的目标后，都设定了适度的 2024 年经济增长目标，这表明今年全国范围内恢复到大流行前水平的情况将再次难以实现。
item.author: Ellen Zhang, Ryan Woo

item.title: 气候受到威胁的图瓦卢举行选举，中国台湾关注
item.description: Voting began on Friday in the tiny Pacific Island nation of Tuvalu in a national election that is being closely watched by China, Taiwan, the US and its ally Australia, amid a tussle for influence in the region.翻译:周五，太平洋小岛国图瓦卢的全国选举投票开始，中国、台湾、美国及其盟友澳大利亚都在密切关注这场选举，以争夺该地区的影响力。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，中国敦促伊朗遏制胡塞武装在红海的袭击
item.description: Chinese officials have asked their Iranian counterparts to help rein in attacks on ships in the Red Sea by the Iran-backed Houthis, or risk harming business relations with Beijing, four Iranian sources and a diplomat familiar with the matter said.翻译:四名伊朗消息人士和一名知情外交官表示，中国官员已要求伊朗同行帮助制止伊朗支持的胡塞武装在红海对船只的袭击，否则可能会损害与北京的商业关系。
item.author: Parisa Hafezi, Andrew Hayley

item.title: 中国音乐学生因威胁民主活动人士在美国被判有罪
item.description: A Chinese music student was convicted on Thursday of U.S. charges that he harassed an activist who posted fliers at the Berklee College of Music in Boston supporting democracy in China and threatened to report her activities to Chinese law enforcement.翻译:周四，一名中国音乐学生因美国指控骚扰一名在波士顿伯克利音乐学院张贴支持中国民主传单的活动人士而被定罪，并威胁要向中国执法部门举报她的活动。
item.author: Nate Raymond

item.title: 中国恒大集团出售全部资产股权以削减债务
item.description: China Evergrande said on Thursday one of its units had entered a deal to sell its entire stake in Shantou Hengmeng Property Development for 137.6 million yuan ($19.20 million).翻译:中国恒大周四表示，旗下子公司已达成协议，以 1.376 亿元人民币（1,920 万美元）出售其在汕头恒盟房地产开发公司的全部股权。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 意大利揭露与中国影子银行网络有关的19亿美元欺诈案
item.description: Italian police said on Thursday they had uncovered a tax fraud carried out by 85 suspects involving 1.7 billion euros ($1.9 billion) in false invoices, with the money laundered through a system of so-called Chinese shadow banks.翻译:意大利警方周四表示，他们发现了 85 名嫌疑人实施的税务欺诈，涉及 17 亿欧元（19 亿美元）的虚假发票，这些资金通过所谓的中国影子银行系统进行洗钱。
item.author: Reuters
